My power grows and grows. No one here can understand its depths, much less surpass me in a contest of skills. My chaos spell is far beyond the abilities of my finest teachers, and I intend to unleash it on the entire castle. I can't wait to see their faces go white with shock and red with anger.

And now there's a voice that keeps urging me to break the sealing spells on the Altar of Vadoma. But that's what keeps the demons away! Why won't the voice leave me alone?!
